channel.title: One Square Meter
channel.description: A year-long biodiversity documetation of 1m² area in Gundmi, India.

item.title: Sighting: Rust fly
item.description:
Rust fly (Psilidae sp.)

Category: Insect | Season: Winter

very tiny bug, I am not sure of the specific species yet.

Weather: 27.7°C, Overcast

item.title: Sighting: Lynx Spider
item.description:
Lynx Spider (Oxyopes sertatus)

Category: Arachnid | Season: Winter

My first spider in the patch!

Weather: 27.7°C, Overcast

item.title: Sighting: Acrobat Ant
item.description:
Acrobat Ant (Crematogaster sp.)

Category: Insect | Season: Winter

It has distinctive heart-shaped abdomen!

Weather: 27.7°C, Overcast

item.title: Sighting: Srilankan Weevil
item.description:
Srilankan Weevil (Myllocerus undecimpustulatus)

Category: Insect | Season: Winter

It is a weevil!

Weather: 27.7°C, Overcast

item.title: Sighting: Ground Cricket
item.description:
Ground Cricket (Dianemobius fascipes.jpg)

Category: Insect | Season: Winter

Still trying to get a better picture. I can see myself buying a nice flash to getter better light.

Weather: 27.7°C, Overcast

item.title: Sighting: Grasshopper
item.description:
Grasshopper (Spathosternum prasiniferum)

Category: Insect | Season: Winter

I have taken way better pictures of this in the past, but we go with this for now. Dude can hop!

Weather: 27.7°C, Overcast

item.title: Sighting: Carpenter Ant
item.description:
Carpenter Ant (Camponotus Parius)

Category: Insect | Season: Winter

Such a common ant around here. Can give a nasty bite!

Weather: 28.0°C, Overcast

item.title: Sighting: Ground Cricket
item.description:
Ground Cricket (Dianemobius Fascipes)

Category: Insect | Season: Winter

So hard to spot on the ground, such a good camouflage.

Weather: 28.0°C, Overcast

item.title: Sighting: Ground Beetle
item.description:
Ground Beetle (Bembidion quadrimaculatum)

Category: Insect | Season: Winter

Moves quite fast, not sure if it can fly.

Weather: 28.0°C, Overcast

item.title: Sighting: Tropical Fire Ant
item.description:
Tropical Fire Ant (Solenopsis geminata)

Category: Insect | Season: Winter

Moves quite fast, hard to take good images.

Weather: 27.9°C, Overcast

item.title: Sighting: Dusty Surface Beetle
item.description:
Dusty Surface Beetle (Gonocephalum adpressiforme)

Category: Insect | Season: Winter

Hides under the shades of leaves.

Weather: 27.9°C, Overcast

item.title: Day one!
item.description:
So it begins.

Hello world!

Welcome to a square meter project, here we like bugs. Find more about the project in the about section.

Today, I set up the fence posts on 4 corners of the patch, cleaned up the space a bit, placed an old wood piece in it. That is it. No more fiddling with the patch for the rest of the year.

Here it is!

My first immediate dilemma is this:

If I spot a bug within the square meter but it moves out of the boundary before I can get a photo, should I still take the picture and count it as a sighting, or should I let it go?
